# stopTunnel()

**Instance Method**

Start the process of disconnecting the tunnel.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopTunnel()
```

## Discussion

This method returns immediately after starting the process of disconnecting the tunnel. In order to be notified when the tunnel is fully disconnected, register to observe the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNStatusDidChangeNotification] notification on the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NETunnelProviderSession] object and examine its status property when the notification is received.

## Controlling the tunnel connection

- **startTunnel(options:)**: Start the process of connecting the tunnel.
